content: iris flower free crochet pattern by @lily s lyric video tutorial https //youtu be/25dmyx1_gak content 1 material ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 2 - 2 abbreviation ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 3 - 3 crochet pattern --------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 4 - - small petal ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ - 4 - - big petal -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 4 - - calyx ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ - 4 - - leaf -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - 5 - - 1 - 1 material - 2 - 2 abbreviation chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet … work all stitches on the same stitch x … repeat instructions in brackets x times slip_stitch unbold slip_stitch it doesn t count as a stitch for the round chain unbold turning chain/beginning chain it doesn t count as a stitch for the round put wire on put wire on at the beginning of a round and crochet with wire for this round step-by-step picture tutorial of put wire on 1 after inserting the hook into the first stitch put the wire on the hook and under the working yarn 2 yarn over and pull through the stitch and the wire will be caught by yarn 3 crochet with wire for this whole round * you may temporarily bend the extra wire down so your hand won t be bothered - 3 - 3 crochet pattern - small petal 2 0mm hook | yellow&pink yarn | make 3 round 1 11ch put wire on 2sc 2hdc 3dc 2hdc 3sc 2hdc 3dc 2hdc 2sc slip_stitch 21st round 2 change color chain 6sc half_double_crochet 7 3dc half_double_crochet 6sc slip_stitch 35st round 3 chain 6sc half_double_crochet 21 3ch single_crochet half_double_crochet 6sc slip_stitch - big petal 2 0mm hook | pink&white yarn | make 3 round 1 13ch put wire on 2sc 2hdc 5dc 2hdc 3sc 2hdc 5dc 2hdc 2sc slip_stitch 25st round 2 change color chain 6sc half_double_crochet 11 3dc half_double_crochet 6sc slip_stitch 47st round 3 chain 6sc half_double_crochet 33 3ch single_crochet half_double_crochet 6sc slip_stitch - calyx 2 0mm hook | green yarn | make 3 round 1 15ch work into the 4th chain 6dc 3hdc 2sc 25st 3sc 2sc 3hdc 5dc double_crochet 2ch slip_stitch - 4 - - leaf 2 0mm hook | green yarn round 1 25ch put wire on 23sc 3sc 23sc slip_stitch 49st round 2 2ch 12dc 6hdc 6sc single_crochet 2ch single_crochet 6sc 6hdc 11dc double_crochet 2ch slip_stitch 52st assembling part start at 17 06 -
